## BlockPolledMoneypStore class

Bitcoins-based [MoneypStore](./lib-base.moneypstore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledMoneypStore extends MoneypStore<BlockPolledMoneypStoreExtraState> 
```
